GetNearestSpecies
public static int GetNearestSpecies<T>(
IDistanceMetric<T> distanceMetric,
NeatGenome<T> genome,
Species<T>[] speciesArr
)
where T : struct

Get the index of the species with a centroid that is nearest to the provided genome.

Type Parameter
T

Connection weight data type.

Parameters
distanceMetric
IDistanceMetric<T>

Distance metric.

genome
NeatGenome<T>

The genome.

speciesArr
Species<T>[]

An array of species to compare the genome with.

Returns

The index of the species that is nearest to genome.
